name: WaffleQuest Demo
description:
What is WaffleQuest?

WaffleQuest is a turn based RPG based on exploring the world and trying to defeat the Rotten Waffle gang, go on an adventure with Waffle, and encounter sentient basketballs, angry snakes, and downright weird things.

When will the full game release?

I'm trying my hardest to get the full game done, however making games takes time, so please be patient.

I won't be giving a specific release date, since I can't usually follow them and they also make me anxious.

Credits

Multiple music artists, none of the music in this game is mine.

Disclaimer

Some music isn't added at all yet, I'm working on adding more music soon.
